attributes.action: Deselect Barry Sheerman as a Member of Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
He also branded leave supporters as less well educated than remainers.
For these reasons, this man needs deselecting and a by-election needs to be held at the soonest possible time.
People of Huddersfield and the wider community have no faith in this MP any longer.
attributes.background:
Barry Sheerman is the Labour MP for Kirklees, West Yorkshire.
He has opposed Brexit and gone against the 55% of Kirklees constituents who voted to leave the European Union.
He constantly portrays that he speaks for his constituents but follows his own beliefs.
This is not democratic.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for someone to lose their job.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/270324
